description: Primes of the form 2np+1 where p is prime(n).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
prog: (PARI) je=[]; for(n=0,200, if(isprime(2*n*prime(n)+1), je=concat(je,2*n*prime(n)+1),)); je(PARI) { n=c=0; forprime (p=2, 5*10^5, q=2*(c++)*p + 1; if (isprime(q), write("b062403.txt", n++, " ", q); if (n==1000, break)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 07 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 08 2001
extensions: Definition corrected to say "where p is prime(n)" by _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 07 2009
